duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage Agile delivery model, whether Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe), Lean Kanban, DevSecOps, or other iterative development approaches
Gather, manage, and prioritize customer requirements and act as the customer advocate articulating the user's needs
Manage the product throughout the product life cycle from planning to execution in support of organizational strategy and objectives
Provide strategic roadmap with alignment to goals and operations plans
Serve as an escalation point for customer concerns and identify appropriate resolutions to achieve client satisfaction
Improve product line performance through automation, continuous integration pipelines (CI/CD), and DevOps/DevSecOps
Establish test plans and oversee hands-on execution, providing guidance on testing routines and rigor
Conduct independent research to lead or support resolution of complex issues

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in a Business, Engineering, or Technical discipline plus 15 years of experience; 10 additional years of experience can be substituted for the degree requirement
